data.comment: Daniele Padelli (Inter) is shown a red card without being on the pitch!
The match is underway at Allianz Stadium.
The match is underway at Allianz Stadium.
Inter's Matias Vecino gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Juventus goal kick.
Free kick Juventus.
Marco Guida signals a free kick to Inter in their own half.
Douglas Costa for Juventus gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Juventus drive upfield and Cristiano Ronaldo gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Inter defender.
Marco Guida signals a free kick to Juventus.
In Turin, Cristiano Ronaldo of Juventus is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Corner awarded to Juventus.
Juventus push forward at Allianz Stadium and Matthijs De Ligt gets in a great header. The attempt is cleared by the Inter defence.
Juventus have been awarded a corner by Marco Guida.
Can Juventus capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Inter's half?
Inter to take a throw-in in Juventus territory.
Juventus's Cristiano Ronaldo gets in a shot on goal at Allianz Stadium. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Throw-in Inter.
Antonio Candreva (Inter) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Throw-in for Inter in the half of Juventus.
Ball safe as Juventus is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Juventus pushes forward through Blaise Matuidi, whose finish on goal is saved.
Marco Guida signals a throw-in for Juventus, close to Inter's area.
Inter awarded a free kick in their own half.
Can Inter get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Juventus's half?
Inter have a dangerous throw-in.
Inter are coming forward and Nicolo Barella gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Marco Guida awards Juventus a goal kick.
Corner awarded to Juventus.
In Turin, Matthijs De Ligt (Juventus) misses the target with a header.
Goal kick for Inter at Allianz Stadium.
Antonio Candreva of Inter gets in a strike, but is off target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Turin.
Free kick for Juventus in their own half.
Throw-in high up the field for Juventus in Turin.
Juventus needs to be cautious. Inter have an attacking throw-in.
Juventus have a goal kick.
Inter have been awarded a corner by Marco Guida.
Stefan De Vrij (Inter) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
Marco Guida awards Juventus a goal kick.
Juventus awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Juventus close to the penalty box.
Inter are pushing forward but Antonio Candreva's finish is wide of the goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Juventus goal kick.
Marco Guida signals a free kick to Inter in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Matias Vecino (Inter) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Inter close to the penalty box.
Lautaro Martinez (Inter) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Antonio Candreva (Inter) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Inter's Marcelo Brozovic breaks free at Allianz Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Juventus have a goal kick.
Blaise Matuidi for Juventus is whistled offside.
Inter drives forward and Marcelo Brozovic gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Free kick for Juventus in the half of Inter.
Juventus drive upfield and Cristiano Ronaldo gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Inter defender.
Juventus have been awarded a corner by Marco Guida.
Leonardo Bonucci's header is off-target for Juventus.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Turin.
Marco Guida awards the away team a throw-in.
Marco Guida signals a Inter throw-in in Juventus's half.
Free kick for Juventus in their own half.
Marco Guida signals a free kick to Juventus in their own half.
In Turin a free kick has been awarded the home team.
The first-half is over.
The second-half has just kicked-off.
Corner awarded to Inter.
Lautaro Martinez (Inter) strikes at Allianz Stadium but his header is cleared.
Throw-in for Juventus at Allianz Stadium.
Throw-in for Inter close to the penalty box.
Can Juventus get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Inter's half?
Free kick for Juventus in their own half.
Throw-in for Juventus in their own half.
Inter push forward at Allianz Stadium and Marcelo Brozovic gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Juventus defence.
Free kick for Inter in the half of Juventus.
Gonzalo Higuain (Juventus) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Goal! Aaron Ramsey gives Juventus a 1-0 lead in Turin.
That's a fine assist from Cristiano Ronaldo.
Inter awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Juventus awarded a free kick in their own half.
Marco Guida signals a free kick to Juventus in their own half.
Maurizio Sarri is making the team's first substitution at Allianz Stadium with Paulo Dybala replacing Douglas Costa.
Antonio Conte (Inter) is making a first substitution, with Christian Eriksen replacing Nicolo Barella.
Throw-in Juventus.
In Turin Juventus attack through Cristiano Ronaldo. The finish is off target, however.
Goal kick for Inter at Allianz Stadium.
Marco Guida signals a free kick to Juventus just outside Inter's area.
Inter's Milan Skriniar has been booked in Turin.
Juventus's Cristiano Ronaldo gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Inter defender.
Corner awarded to Juventus.
Inter awarded a free kick in their own half.
Paulo Dybala puts the ball in the net and the home team extend their lead. The score-line now reads 2-0.
Aaron Ramsey instrumental with a fine assist.
Free kick for Juventus in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Inter goal kick.
Juventus awarded a free kick in their own half.
Matias Vecino is booked for the away team.
Ball safe as Inter is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Juventus's Cristiano Ronaldo misses with an attempt on goal.
Goal kick for Inter at Allianz Stadium.
Throw-in for Juventus at Allianz Stadium.
The away team have replaced Antonio Candreva with Roberto Gagliardini. This is the second substitution made today by Antonio Conte.
Inter have a goal kick.
The match at Allianz Stadium has been interrupted briefly for a check on Alex Sandro, who is down injured.
Alexis Sanchez is replacing Romelu Lukaku for Inter at Allianz Stadium.
Inter are pushing forward but Christian Eriksen's finish is wide of the goal.
Marco Guida awards Juventus a goal kick.
The home team has substituted Alex Sandro with Mattia De Sciglio. Maurizio Sarri is thus making his second change.
Free kick for Juventus in their own half.
Marcelo Brozovic (Inter) has received a first yellow card.
Federico Bernardeschi is replacing Gonzalo Higuain for the home team.
Inter have been awarded a corner by Marco Guida.
Can Inter capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Juventus's half?
Throw-in for Inter in the half of Juventus.
Inter have a dangerous throw-in.
Throw-in for Juventus in their own half.
Corner awarded to Inter.
Marco Guida signals a free kick to Inter in their own half.
Cristiano Ronaldo (Juventus) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Juventus needs to be cautious. Inter have an attacking throw-in.
Juventus awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Juventus in their own half.
4 minutes will be added to the 2nd half in Turin.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Marco Guida awards the home team a throw-in.
Marco Guida signals a free kick to Inter.
Free kick Juventus.
Cristiano Ronaldo of Juventus gets in a strike, but is off target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Turin.
Juventus's Cristiano Ronaldo misses with an attempt on goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Inter goal kick.
The second-half is over. The match ends 2-0.
